text: Moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat kun: (Moro irsod va dalolat namo ʙa rohi mustaqim va tavfiq farmo va ʙar on ustuvor kun, to ʙa didori Tu musarraf savem. Va on roh Islom ast. Rohest, ki ʙandaro ʙa rizojati Alloh va cannatas meʙarad. Banda saodatmand namesavad, to modome ki dar in roh mustaqim naʙosad)
